local_intent: Lift the grasped cloth corner upward by 5 cm to clear the table.
assumptions: Gripper already closed on cloth corner
Safe to move upward along +Z by 0.05 m
coherence_with_global: Implements the post-grasp lift: after confirming a stable grasp, move +Z by 0.05 m and verify the cloth remains held, matching the MoveDelta step in GLOBAL_BT.
